thread.title: Emotional Kym Marsh pays poignant tribute to her late son in heartbreaking post
thread.title_full: Emotional Kym Marsh pays poignant tribute to her late son in heartbreaking post

author: Emma Pryer
title: Emotional Kym Marsh pays poignant tribute to her late son in heartbreaking post
text:
TV Emotional Kym Marsh pays poignant tribute to her late son in heartbreaking post Coronation Street actress lost Archie back in 2009 when he was born just 23 weeks into her pregnancy Share Kym Marsh lost her baby son eight years ago today (Photo: WENN.com) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Corrie star Kym Marsh paid tribute to her late son in a poignant message to fans earlier today. 
She said: “This day eight years ago my baby boy got his angel wings. Happy birthday my beautiful Archie. We love you very much and we miss you ever day.” 
Alongside it she shared a touching poem with her Twitter followers. 
The mum of three lost Archie, her son with ex-husband Jamie Lomas, back in 2009 when she gave birth just 23 weeks into her pregnancy. Read More Kym Marsh DENIES ‘angry meltdown’ in London hotel when staff didn't recognise her Archie was Kym's son with Jamie Lomas (Photo: PA) 
Kym, 40, also revealed that she would be teaming up with a charity, called Saying Goodbye, to host The Archie Ball, in memory of her little boy, next year. 
Earlier this year the actress was flooded with support after her Weatherfield character, Michelle Connor, battled the heartache of giving birth to a stillborn boy with on-screen husband Steve McDonald. Read More 
Simon Gregson, who plays Steve, also revealed he had grieved the loss of eleven babies of his own. Like us on Facebook
